content.question: A. Compare the trend lines for the region of Latin America and the Caribbean to the trend for the region of East Asia and the Pacific during the 2006 to 2019 time period. B. Explain the degree to which transnational migration patterns have affected agricultural employment at the global scale. C. Explain a possible limitation of the data in the graph to explain the impacts of global food distribution networks on the agricultural percentage of the workforce. D. Using a region on the graph, explain how the region’s changes in the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect subsistence farming.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Explain the degree to which a geographic concept, process, model, or theory effectively explains geographic effects in different contexts and regions of the world.
